very nice
One of the best games made by Valve. It has portals, companion cubes, light bridges, portals, robots, Wheatley, portals, GLaDOS, gels, excursion bridges and did I mention portals yet?
bu oyun başımı ağrıtıyor kızgın.

ever heard of a one way out only? well, that fact doesn't exist in portal 2, where somehow our fellow Scientist managed to invent the 'portal gun' which opens up quite the unlimited possibilities in terms of how to move between places and transport yourself and way more control over materials and how to move them freely in a never seen way before.

 yet in the wrong hands or rather extremely Scientific hands, thirsty for more knowledge about what we have created, lead them to create the 'test chambers'.

you, as the player, you have to go through them, testing and solving puzzles.

as the game advance, or you advance in the game the puzzles become more ... not frustrating, like many other games -of this type- becomes after you reach the advanced levels. no, in portal 2 the levels become more ... creative, more appealing to play without repeating itself, using the old 'tools' at your disposal, the old methods but with a new taste it feels, which keep the game fresh, not boring and undoubtedly enjoyable.
yet you might enjoy it, but the character you are playing is not, in fact, it's his prison, spending your life testing and solving puzzles doesn't sound good does it?

and here where your real mission start ... not testing any more chambers but... but finding your freedom ...
escaping to what behind those cold metal walls, to what beyond this harsh iron sealing above you, to see the world and beyond, to visit the space maybe...

do you want your freedom? 
go get it.

recommended.

The perfect game, in my opinion - first of all, not mindless, like many games nowadays. Secondly, it has an amazing single-player campaign, with  a great plot and characters. There is also a dedicated multiplayer campaign for having fun with friends, and an endless gameplay expansion with the Perpetual Testing Initiative. Very good visuals and soundtrack, too. ~14 hours of gameplay on my record, and I am looking forward to at least twice as much more. Thank you, Valve, for such a great experience.

Portal 2 is an excellent puzzle platformer with intitutive design that takes full advantage of the game's mechanics. One of the problems of the first game was the fact that it was too short and the story was somewhat limited. However, Portal 2 fixes those issues with a more in-depth story and longer game time. I won't risk spoiling anything for those who still haven't played this game, but trust me, the story and environments are fantastic, and the humor is great. The new characters like Wheatley and Cave Johnson are also fun and interesting, and do not take away from the Portal experience. New gameplay additions not seen in the first game such as gels and light bridges, are also interesting mechanics that increases the variety of the game. The level design is also extremely well done, making you think without being incredibly brain taxing. So overall, I highly recommend this one.
10/10 Would buy Portal 3 if there was one. Got to keep those heart cubes with you.

Portal 2... Where do I start.
First to begin, there may or may not be spoilers ahead.
So, when the 2017 Winter sale was going on, I got some steam money. I've already heard of Portal and Portal 2, but I never truly looked into it. However, when I saw thay they were on sale, I just had to buy the two games. I play through Portal and am already LOVING it. I play through Portal 2, and... I have to say... IT. WAS. AMAZING. It had quite a few twists and turns, a very nice amount of backstory, from Doug Rattman, to Cave Johnson and Caroline, and to top it all off, Wheatley.
Fricken, loveable ol' Wheatley. UNTIL [This sentence has been moderated so anyone new won't know what the ending of the game has].
Overall, amazing game. 11/10, would play again and again and again.
A masterpiece of puzzlegames. Not too hard, but innovative and fun.

Stephen William Hawking (pronunciación en inglés: /stiːvən_ˈhɔːkɪŋ/ ( escuchar); Oxford, 8 de enero de 1942-Cambridge, 14 de marzo de 2018)3​4​ fue un físico teórico, astrofísico, cosmólogo y divulgador científico británico. Sus trabajos más importantes consistieron en aportar, junto con Roger Penrose, teoremas respecto a las singularidades espaciotemporales en el marco de la relatividad general y la predicción teórica de que los agujeros negros emitirían radiación,5​ lo que se conoce hoy en día como radiación de Hawking (o a veces radiación Bekenstein-Hawking).
Era miembro de la Real Sociedad de Londres, de la Academia Pontificia de las Ciencias y de la Academia Nacional de Ciencias de Estados Unidos. Fue titular de la Cátedra Lucasiana de Matemáticas (Lucasian Chair of Mathematics) de la Universidad de Cambridge desde 1979 hasta su jubilación en 2009.6​
Entre las numerosas distinciones que le fueron concedidas, recibió doce doctorados honoris causa y fue galardonado con la Orden del Imperio Británico (grado CBE) en 1982, el Premio Príncipe de Asturias de la Concordia en 1989, la Medalla Copley en 2006, la Medalla de la Libertad en 20097​ y el Premio Fundación BBVA Fronteras del Conocimiento en 2015.
Hawking padecía una enfermedad motoneuronal relacionada con la esclerosis lateral amiotrófica (ELA) que se le diagnosticó con 21 años y que fue agravando su estado con el paso de los años, hasta dejarlo casi completamente paralizado5​ y le forzó a comunicarse a través de un aparato generador de voz. Estuvo casado en dos ocasiones y tuvo tres hijos.
Como autor de libros divulgativos sobre ciencia alcanzó enormes éxitos de ventas, en los que discute sobre sus propias teorías y la cosmología en general, como Breve historia del tiempo: del Big Bang a los agujeros negros (A Brief History of Time: From the Big Bang to Black Holes), de 1988, y que estuvo en la lista de bestsellers del The Sunday Times británico durante 237 semanas, Brevísima historia del tiempo (A Briefer History of Time), de 2005, en colaboración con Leonard Mlodinow, en la que trató de explicar de la manera más sencilla posible la Historia del Universo, motivo por el cual se le conoció como "el historiador del tiempo"8​ o "el historiador del universo"9​, y El universo en una cáscara de nuez (The Universe in a Nutshell), de 2001.

El burrito o burrito de harina1​es un platillo que consiste en una tortilla de harina de trigo enrollada en forma cilíndrica en la que se rellena de carne asada y frijoles refritos. En contraste, un taco se hace siempre enrollando la tortilla alrededor del relleno, mismo que puede ser prácticamente de cualquier alimento o guiso. La versión estadounidense (Tex-Mex) de taco es generalmente formado al doblar una tortilla a la mitad alrededor de la carne, dejando el perímetro semicircular abierto.

Portal 2, несомненно является одной из лучших игр своего жанра.
Именно здесь можно с удовольствием напрягать извилины и именно тут в кооперативном режиме, можно сплотиться с друзьями. Идеальная ира? А точно пойдёт на мой компьютер? Попробуем разобраться.

Со всеми бывает такое, когда хочется купить игру, но посмотрев на цену, сразу пропадает желание. К счастью это не про Portal 2, так как у этой игры вполне адекватная цена, которая себя полностью оправдывает.

[i]А системные требования? Пойдёт ли игра на моём ведре?[/i]
- Пойдёт, и даже полетит, ведь игра не требовательна, а значит пойдёт даже на слабом пк.

[i]А как же графика, наверное тут у всего по пять полигонов?[/i]
- Насчёт графики могу сказать только одно... Тут нет 4k текстур, видны неровности, но по меркам 2011 года, игра выглядит красивой и даже имеет собственную стилистику.

[i]Игры делают людей жестокими, запретить![/i]
- Эх как же я "обожаю" этот тип людей, которые во всём обвиняют игры. Но к этой игре трудно придраться, ведь она не только помогает отдохнуть, но и развивает логику, образное мышление и сообразительность. Её можно было бы использовать для обучения в школах (на уроках информатики или на физике), я бы не отказался.

[i]Когда пройдёшь сюжет, игра закончится?[/i]
- Если вы прошли всю сюжетную линию, то можете позвать друга и пройти с ним кооперативный режим. Ну, а если у вас нет друзей, то можете смело открывать мастерскую и играть в комнатах, созданных сообществом.

[i]Так стоит ли покупать Portal 2?[/i]
- Я однозначно рекомендую эту игру всем любителям головоломок и хорошего юмора. Ведь Portal 2, это игра не на один день.
